name: The Greg Parable
description:
This is a remake of the Stanley parable created by a small team of NYU students. All the assets, music and sound are done entirely by us. If your name is not Greg this game will likely be lost on you, however, you are still very much welcome to play. Enjoy and remember: the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end is never the end.

Check it out on Youtube!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=51nBEmoyhZ4&feature=youtu.be
